query:
SELECT r.id, r.title, r.flockId, r.status, r.dueDate, f.flockNumber
FROM reminders r 
LEFT JOIN flocks f ON r.flockId = f.id 
WHERE r.status = 'pending'
ORDER BY r.dueDate
LIMIT 20
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4WYXdTZ2RFuJQah.8fcf44c6f992 --database SwQCxo7pxW6R8kkqwZSJsv --execute SELECT r.id, r.title, r.flockId, r.status, r.dueDate, f.flockNumber
FROM reminders r 
LEFT JOIN flocks f ON r.flockId = f.id 
WHERE r.status = 'pending'
ORDER BY r.dueDate
LIMIT 20
